tidbits.title: Hygge Lifestyle
tidbits.description: Denmark is known for its 'hygge' lifestyle, emphasizing coziness, comfort, and well-being, often experienced through warm atmospheres and quality time with loved ones.

tidbits.title: Design Excellence
tidbits.description: The country is renowned for its design excellence, seen in modern architecture, sleek furniture, and functional yet stylish innovations.

tidbits.title: Bicycle-Friendly Culture
tidbits.description: Denmark embraces a bicycle-friendly culture, with well-designed cycling infrastructure, making it a popular and efficient mode of transportation.
